resources.string:
This is %1$s, a theme to change Android Auto Look 

If you've never used this theme, I suggest you to look at the previews and the FAQ down below 
This theme is the result of so much effort and if you want to thank me for my work, please consider a donation. Even a small amount is appreciated 😊

To install:
 1. Tick Android Auto
 2. See attention mark near "Android Auto" to avoid errors
 3. Hit the bottom button and select Build & Install
 4. Repeat step 1 as many times as you want
 5. Reboot, go to manager tab, selet the built overlay(s) and enable them

To install:
 1. Tick Android Auto
 2. See attention mark near "Android Auto" to avoid errors
 3. Hit the bottom button and select Build & Install
 4. Repeat steps 3 and 4 as many times as you want
 5. Reboot, go to manager tab, select the built overlay(s) and enable

Heya!
 If you are here, that's because you don't have Substratum Installed.
 %1$s is a theme and needs Substratum to work, it's not a stand-alone app.
 Please install Substratum and try again.
You seem to really enjoy %1$s, would you like to contribute to the development by making a donation to me?

Special thanks to:

 Iconic Icons for the wonderful work of Status Bar Icons.
 Check out Iconic Icons theme and download it to have matching Status Bar Icons with your device.
 It's free and it's a very good Substratum theme to tweak the look of Android System
Check out the other versions of Wallpapers For AA
